turf-count

Calculates the number of points that fall within a set of polygons.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<meta charset=utf-8 />
<title>turf-count</title>
<meta name='viewport' content='initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no' />
<script src='https://rawgit.com/Turfjs/turf/master/turf.min.js'></script>
<script src='https://api.tiles.mapbox.com/mapbox.js/v2.0.1/mapbox.js'></script>
<link href='https://api.tiles.mapbox.com/mapbox.js/v2.0.1/mapbox.css' rel='stylesheet' />
<style>
  body { margin:0; padding:0; }
  #map { position:absolute; top:0; bottom:0; width:100%; }
</style>
</head>
<body>

<div id='map'></div>

<script>
L.mapbox.accessToken = 'pk.eyJ1IjoianZyb3Vzc2VhdSIsImEiOiJYYUNlcVRZIn0.lp0867Jn5ynlj72kMwICSA';

var map = L.mapbox.map('map', 'jvrousseau.h4h90e5o')
    .setView([35.466453, -97.514914], 4);

var polys = [
    turf.polygon([[
        [ -93.515625, 25.64152637306577 ],
        [ -93.515625, 40.84706035607122 ],
        [ -76.640625, 40.84706035607122 ],
        [ -76.640625, 25.64152637306577 ],
        [ -93.515625, 25.64152637306577 ]]
    ], {
        "fill": "#6BC65F",
        "stroke": "#6BC65F",
        "stroke-width": 5,
        "title": "Number of points in poly"
    }),
    turf.polygon([[
        [-123.74999999999999, 29.075375179558346],
        [-123.74999999999999, 42.81152174509788],
        [-96.328125, 42.81152174509788],
        [-96.328125, 29.075375179558346],
        [-123.74999999999999,29.075375179558346]]
    ], {
        "fill": "#25561F",
        "stroke": "#25561F",
        "stroke-width": 5,
        "title": "Number of points in poly"
    })
];
var poly_fc = turf.featurecollection(polys);
var points_layer = L.mapbox.featureLayer().loadURL('/turf-www/assets/js/pressure.json').addTo(map);
points_layer.on('ready', function () {

var count = turf.count(poly_fc, points_layer.toGeoJSON(), 'description');

L.mapbox.featureLayer().setGeoJSON(count).addTo(map);
});
</script>

</body>
</html>
